title: Projects
body:
Projects¶

Projects keeps a record of all the projects (current and disabled/inactive) that have been created by you or users in your organization.

  1. Click the in the ribbon

  2. Click Finance

  3. Click Projects

  4. Click the and click Edit Project </users/general/guides/functions_of_the_grid/how_to_edit.html>`_project, `Merge Project, or Disable Project to perform the associated action

    • Click Enable Project to turn back on a project that has been disabled (is labelled inactive)

  5. Click on project to view project details and project members by clicking on the project

    • Within a selected project, click the and click Edit Project </users/general/guides/functions_of_the_grid/how_to_edit.html>`_project, **Disable Project**, or `Edit Project </users/general/guides/functions_of_the_grid/how_to_edit.html>`_project, `Manage Users,
